name: CAEmitterLayer
desc: A layer that emits, animates, and renders a particle system.

items.name: var emitterCells: [CAEmitterCell]?
items.desc: The array emitter cells attached to the layer.

items.name: var renderMode: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode
items.desc: Defines how particle cells are rendered into the layer.

items.name: var emitterPosition: CGPoint
items.desc: The position of the center of the particle emitter. Animatable.

items.name: var emitterZPosition: CGFloat
items.desc: Specifies the center of the particle emitter shape along the z-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var emitterDepth: CGFloat
items.desc: Determines the depth of the emitter shape.

items.name: var emitterSize: CGSize
items.desc: Determines the size of the particle emitter shape. Animatable.

items.name: var scale: Float
items.desc: Defines a multiplier applied to the cell-defined particle scale.

items.name: var seed: UInt32
items.desc: Specifies the seed used to initialize the random number generator.

items.name: var spin: Float
items.desc: Defines a multiplier applied to the cell-defined particle spin. Animatable.

items.name: var velocity: Float
items.desc: Defines a multiplier applied to the cell-defined particle velocity. Animatable.

items.name: var birthRate: Float
items.desc: Defines a multiplier that is applied to the cell-defined birth rate. Animatable

items.name: var lifetime: Float
items.desc: Defines a multiplier applied to the cell-defined lifetime range when particles are created. Animatable.

items.name: var preservesDepth: Bool
items.desc: Defines whether the layer flattens the particles into its plane.
